title: The Craftsman
description: From bestselling crime writer Sharon Bolton comes a startling tour de force, hailed in the national press as 'Bolton at her best'.OLD ENEMIES... NEW CRIMESThirty years ago, WPC Florence Lovelady's career was made when she arrested coffin-maker Larry Glassbrook for three shocking murders.Larry confessed; it was an open and shut case. But now he's dead, and events from the past are repeating themselves.The town Florence left behind still has many secrets. Will she finally uncover the truth? Or will time run out for her first?
author: Sharon J. Bolton
